name: Golden Chalice's Bounty
description: After opponent's characters are affected by the Bloom reaction: Your team no longer generates Dendro Core, but instead summons Bountiful Core.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After opponent's characters are affected by the Bloom reaction:</color> Your team no longer generates <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116]</color>, but instead summons $[K1011].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After opponent's characters are affected by the Bloom reaction:</color> Your team no longer generates <color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>, but instead summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bountiful Core</color>.
